Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text:
Beautiful and spacious seating area, indoor and outdoor in a very convenient location.
The food is okay but not great, perfect for friends gatherings. …

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: The carrot cake looked mouthwatering and was delicious (and huge). Everything we ate was very sweet and rich. The place was really pricy though, you could grab a lunch instead, moreover, the prices were poorly labeled. A big plus for the generous opening hours. Spacious with a fresh decor.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: The place doesn’t run with that name anymore. It’s a big Italian place with wide range of deserts and ice cream. I visited a couple of time, all the deserts we tried were good, however the quality of the coffee went down.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Location is fine and the experience is very nice, but the ice cream is kinda bland. It has a very weak taste :(  can't say anything about the prices as I'm the first time in Stockholm, a scoop of ice cream is 20 Krona

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: I visited Cafe Belmondo today and decided to have a slice of walnut cheesecake. Little I had known that this would possibly be the worse experience I had... The cake tasted old, sickeningly sweet and it was not chilled as it supposed to be. …

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Went into have the breakfast, and that was a huge mistake. For starters the staff isn't friendly at all, unless you are a regular. We ordered a simple scrambled eggs and bacon and it was a disappointment when it arrived. Portion was way too …

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Really loud and untasteful music made it feel like I left innertown and was out in Kista all of a sudden. Price was unexpectedly high 55kr for an Americano and a majority of the customers were kinda fishy.. I'd say that Espresso House across the street or any other Café is a better choice.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Eating here was not a good experience. Four out of five dishes were inedible/ had hair in them/ was not what was ordered. Not a place I'd recommend for warm dishes.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Had scampi and salad and Swedish meatball - free flow salad and bread. Solid but nothing memorable - 350Kr for 2.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Coffee ok, but food had an all over "industrial touch". Not very authentic. Had a bad biscotti and an icecream without taste. Pricy, even for Stockholm. Head elsewhere.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Do not buy ice cream here. She deliberately fills it half way (keeps the bottom of the cup hollow). Tastes bland too.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Didn't accept cash. Quiet good coffee. But it served with an empty cup. I have to use valve to full my cup.

Name: Caf√© Belmondo
Review Text: Very expensive! Nice location and furniture, but other then that nothing special. Would not visit again since the prices are too high.
